scripts.build:frontend: cd App/frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd App/backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:apps: npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:backend
scripts.deploy:backend: cd App/backend && npm run package && cd ../.. && az webapp deployment source config-zip -g $RESOURCE_GROUP -n $WEBAPP_NAME --src App/backend/metaverse-social-backend.zip
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:infra && npm run build && npm run deploy:apps
